patthana4.7:1.1: Akusalaṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:2.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:4.1: Kusalaṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:5.1: Akusalaṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:6.1: Abyākataṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.7:7.1: Kusalaṃ nadassanena pahātabbañca abyākataṃ nadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)

patthana4.7:9.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:11.1: Kusalo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo kusalassa nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:12.1: Akusalo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo akusalassa nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:13.1: Abyākato nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo abyākatassa nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:14.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare satta …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:16.1: Akusalaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:17.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:20.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana4.7:21.1: Akusalaṃ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:43.1: Abyākato savitakko dhammo abyākatassa savitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:44.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta …pe… sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… sampayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:46.1: Kusalaṃ avitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:47.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ, avigate satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:49.1: Kusalo avitakko dhammo kusalassa avitakkassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:50.1: Abyākato avitakko dhammo abyākatassa avitakkassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:51.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā …pe… sahajāte satta, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane tīṇi, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre indriye cattāri, jhāne magge pañca, sampayutte dve, vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate dasa. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:53.1: Kusalaṃ savicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo savicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Kusalasavitakkasadisaṃ.)

Kusalaṃ napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:74.1: Kusalaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. patthana4.7:144.1: Akusalaṃ niyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo niyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:145.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana4.7:146.1: Kusalaṃ aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:147.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana4.7:148.1: Kusalaṃ sauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:149.1: Akusalaṃ sauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:150.1: Abyākataṃ sauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.7:151.1: Kusalaṃ sauttarañca abyākataṃ sauttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.7:152.1: Akusalaṃ sauttarañca abyākataṃ sauttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:153.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
patthana4.7:154.1: Kusalo sauttaro dhammo kusalassa sauttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:155.1: Akusalo sauttaro dhammo akusalassa sauttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:156.1: Abyākato sauttaro dhammo abyākatassa sauttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:157.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:158.1: Kusalaṃ anuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo anuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.7:159.1: Abyākataṃ anuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:160.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ, avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:162.1: Kusalo anuttaro dhammo kusalassa anuttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.7:163.1: Abyākato anuttaro dhammo abyākatassa anuttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.7:164.1: Abyākato anuttaro dhammo abyākatassa anuttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.7:165.1: Abyākato anuttaro dhammo kusalassa anuttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:166.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:168.1: Akusalaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:171.1: Kusalaṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:172.1: Abyākataṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.7:173.1: Kusalaṃ araṇañca abyākataṃ araṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.7:174.1: Kusalaṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo araṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
patthana4.7:175.1: Abyākataṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:176.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:178.1: Kusalo araṇo dhammo kusalassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:179.1: Abyākato araṇo dhammo abyākatassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.7:180.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
